title: Microsoft L61 | Bangalore Downleveled
content:
Education: Btech in CS Tier 3
Years of Experience: 5.2 years
Date of Offer: July 2024
Company: Microsoft India
Title: SDE 2
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: INR 33 LPA
Relocation: 4.5L
Joining Bonus: 10L
Stock Bonus: $90k (vested over 4 years)
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
Total Compensation: ~55LPA

Current compensation is 48L + 5L RSU + 6 Perf. Bonus in a fully remote startup. 
Does it make sense to take so much paycut in base just for brand name? WLB is  bad currently but not sure about WLB, learning in MS as well.

Need help from community in deciding it it makes sense to accept this.

title: Goldman Sach | Offer evaluation
content:
Education: B.Tech (CS) from tier-2 college
Years of Experience: 2 years
Prior Experience: Experience at mid startup, and a fintech company
Prior Salary: 12 lpa (base)
Company: Goldman Sach
Title/Level: Analyst
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 20 lpa
Relocation Bonus: 1.4 LPA
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: Verbally communicated 3-4 lpa
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 24 lpa
Benefits: Standard benefits


Is it a lowball offer, considering 2 years of experience? I have tried negotiating with recruiter, but she denied.

title: Arista Networks | Bengaluru | India - Software Engineer
content:
Education: B.Tech, CSE, Tier - 2
Years of Experience: 5 years, SDE 2, Non FAANG Product company.
Date of the Offer: June, 2024
Company: Arista Networks
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Base pay: INR 28,00,000
Retirals: INR 2,35,340 (PF + Gratuity)
Anniversary Bonus: INR 3,00,000 (no clawback)
Joining Bonus: Nil
Relocation Bonus: Nil
Stock bonus: $30,000 (25% vesting for 4 years)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 39.5LPA first year
Benefits: standard benefits like insurance, sodexo allowance of INR 5,000 etc

Prev TC: 30LPA

Interview was not difficult if you are good in C, OS, Networking and LC medium level problems one should be able to clear easily.
yoe: 5 Years, Sde 2, Non Faang Product Company.
